name: Open Digital Development Data Exchange
description: The Open Digital Development Data Exchange is an exhaustive collection of a all nations' digital indicators, sourced from publicly available datasets, aggregated, and normalized to be usable for the first time.

sdgs.relevance: Our digital development data compilation helps to identify gaps in gender equity, opportunities for technical work, areas where certain populations have greater inequalities, success metrics for technical production, and enables governments to strengthen digital services.

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is collected stored and distributed.
contentTypes: Data is aggregated that is open license
userContent.contentManagementPolicy: Inappropriate content can be reported directly to UNDP with contact information available on the website.

deploymentCountriesDepartments: This data is actively used as part of UNDP's Digital Readiness Assessment
